subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Feuding with the coach is a time-honored tradition by N.B.A. superstars, but Orlando center Dwight Howard raises the level by doing it in the middle of a playoff series against the Celtics.
snippet: Feuding with the coach is a time-honored tradition by N.B.A. superstars, but Orlando center Dwight Howard raises the level by doing it in the middle of a playoff series against the Celtics.
